name: quiddity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the basic nature or quality of something, that makes it different from other things: Reading about a subculture like swimming provides an opportunity to appreciate the idiosyncratic details and quiddity of the sport. Synonym
essence (IMPORTANCE)
